summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Postify AI project after GitHub import - Backend APIs working (90% success), Frontend functional with minor UI issues

critical_bugs.issue: Returns 520 Internal Server Error instead of 200
critical_bugs.impact: AI image generation completely broken - users cannot generate images
critical_bugs.error_details: OpenAI image generation API call failing with 520 status

ui_bugs.issue: Modal overlay intercepting clicks on other page elements after dialog interactions
ui_bugs.symptoms: Users cannot click final CTA button when auth dialog has been opened previously

issues: React setState warning in console during registration

passed_tests: Backend: Templates endpoint returns proper data structure
Backend: Content generation using Emergent LLM (GPT-4o-mini)
Frontend: Landing page loads with proper styling
Frontend: Navigation and auth dialogs functional
Frontend: Form inputs and validation working
Integration: Frontend successfully calls backend APIs
action_item_for_main_agent: Fix image generation API - returns 520 error instead of functioning. Check OpenAI API integration in /api/generate-image endpoint. Also address modal overlay click interception issue in auth dialog component.
